casebody.data:
David L. JOHNSON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. D. C. HENDRICKSON et al., Defendants-Appellees. No. 72-2801

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 11, 1972. Marvin J. Zagoria, Atlanta, Ga., for plaintiff-appellant. George P. Dillard, Robert E. Mozley, Herbert 0. Edwards, Decatur, Ga., for def endants-appellees.

Before THORNBERRY, COLEMAN and INGRAHAM, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Company of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

This appeal from the district court's dismissal of appellant’s claims against fewer than all defendants is dismissed, sua sponte. See Rule 54(b), F.R.Civ.P.
